name: craftbeer
description: Website to buy beer. Front End Design

scripts.build-css-all: node-sass scss/_shared.scss shared.css && node-sass scss/_main.scss main.css && node-sass scss/_customers.scss customers/customers.css && node-sass scss/_packages.scss packages/packages.css && node-sass scss/_subscribe.scss subscribe/subscribe.css

author: Uriel Cabrera
